whySellTrendingDesc: Thanks to Temu's global popularity and influence, you'll be able to easily promote your products to more potential customers.
whySellFirstSaleDesc: With Temu's high traffic, 50% of new sellers make their first sale within 20 days.
whySellCostDesc: Benefit from cost-efficiency in store setup, selling, operation and marketing
whySellSupportDesc: Our dedicated team of specialists is here to support your success. From onboarding to boosting product competitiveness, our experienced team provides the guidance you need every step.
faqBecomeSeller: How do I become a Temu seller?
faqBecomeSellerAnswer: You can register as a Temu seller in four simple steps:
faqBecomeSellerStep1: Enter your business information. We accept business types including Corporation, Partnership, and Sole Proprietorship. You also have the option to join as an individual seller.
faqBecomeSellerStep2: Provide your seller information. This includes details like certificate type, address, and seller name.
faqBecomeSellerStep3: Set up your Temu store by adding your store name, logo, and contact information.
faqBecomeSellerStep4: Complete the verification process and start selling on Temu.
faqDocumentation: What documentation is required to become a Temu seller?
faqDocIndividual: For individual applicants, the following information and documents are required for verification:
faqDocIndividual1: Full legal name (first name, last name, and middle name if applicable)
faqDocIndividual6: Government-issued driver's license ID or passport
faqDocBusiness: For business applicants, the following company registration information is required:
faqDocOwners: Additionally, beneficial owners, legal representatives, or executives of the company may need to provide:
faqDocOwners5: Government-issued driver's license ID or passport
faqRegistrationFees: Are there any fees to register as a local seller on Temu?
faqRegistrationFeesAnswer: Temu does not charge any registration fees. You can register as a Temu seller for free.
faqProofOfAddress: What types of proof of address are accepted?
faqProofOfAddressAnswer: We accept Bank statements/Bank confirmation letters, third-party payment statements, and water, electricity, and gas bills are all supported. The proof of address must contain the company name (or the name of the company representative) and address.
footnote1: Normally, applications are reviewed within one business day.
footnote2: According to Temu's internal data, 50% of merchants achieve their first sale within 20 days of listing their products.
registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please verify your email.
registrationError: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
resendFailed: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
verificationError: An error occurred during verification. Please try again.
welcomeBusinessInfo: Welcome! Let us know about your business.
businessTypeHint: You can check on some related documents to select the appropriate business type. Please note that you can only select "Corporation" if the company name ends with INC, Corp or corporation and if it is a limited liability company, you cannot select "Individual".
soleProprietorshipDesc: You own an unincorporated business by yourself.
corporationDesc: The legal entity of your business is independent from its owners.
partnershipDesc: You and one or more people run a business together.
individualDesc: You're selling under your own name, not as a registered business.
idCardHint: Please upload clear photos of your ID card (front and back).
uploadBothIdImages: Please upload both front and back ID card images
uploadFailed: Failed to upload ID card images. Please try again.
applicationFailed: Failed to submit application. Please try again.
applicationError: An error occurred. Please try again.
applicationSubmittedDesc: Thank you for applying to become a Temu seller. Your application is currently under review by our team. We'll notify you via email once it's approved.
nextStep1: Our team will review your application and verify your documents.
nextStep2: You'll receive an email notification about your application status.
nextStep3: Once approved, you can start setting up your shop and listing products!
faqWhyBusinessType: Why do I need to provide my 'Business Type'?
faqWhyBusinessTypeAnswer: Your business type helps us understand your legal structure and ensures we provide the appropriate seller experience and tax documentation for your situation.
faqCountryNotListed: What if my country is not listed?
faqCountryNotListedAnswer: Currently, Temu seller services are only available in select countries. We're continuously expanding to new regions. Please check back later or contact support for updates.
faqWhatIsEINAnswer: An EIN (Employer Identification Number) is a unique nine-digit number assigned by the IRS to businesses operating in the United States for tax purposes.
welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Temu seller registration process! Need help completing this step? Talk to a real person in seconds.
policyEffectiveDate: For sellers who acknowledged a prior version of our Seller Privacy Policy, this version is effective from
policyEffectiveDateNew: For sellers who had not previously acknowledged the Seller Privacy Policy, this version is effective from

howWhyShare: How and Why We Share Your Information
